item.title: By: Kevin Fries
item.dc:creator: Kevin Fries
item.description: Nice trick, I can't wait to try it with not only PukeyPoint(tm) but WP applications. I prefer UltraEdit as I want case sensitive substituting and sorting by column and within line numbers.
item.content:encoded: Nice trick, I can’t wait to try it with not only PukeyPoint(tm) but WP applications. I prefer UltraEdit as I want case sensitive substituting and sorting by column and within line numbers.
